By 29 January 2020, the virus had infected more than 7000 people in China and had caused 170 deaths.
6 At the same time, the disease is gradually being spread to several other countries as the virus can be transmitted through air and contact.
4 Fortunately, at least 124 patients have been cured, according to a recent report of the National Health Commission of the Peopleâ€™s Republic of China.
